document_data.name: Amrelle Mistwind
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Amrelle Mistwind''' was a human female.
document_data.Description: Amrelle was stunningly beautiful and had dark swirling hair that matched her eyes. A gem-studded [[wyvern]] tattoo graced her upper thigh. She was not in the habit of wearing undergarments.
document_data.Activities: Amrelle was involved in the Rightful Conspiracy against the crown, and a member of the very private noble house, [[Mistwind]].
